gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To consider a person or thing to be something
pomeni imeti svoje mnenje o nekem človeku ali stvari.

seg.quote: They consider themselves to be very lucky.
Some British generals considered the attack a mistake.
I consider that one is enough.

sense.def:
To consider something
pomeni pazljivo o nečem razmisliti.

seg.quote: He had no time to consider the matter.

sense.def:
To consider a person's needs, wishes, or feelings
pomeni biti pozoren do potreb, želja ali čustev določenega človeka.
